data.text: Make sure you have your special nuclear fallout masks on. https://t.co/9nuy2hL9GA
@GaryWHall @IIChronDCCXIV @RobinEnochs We wouldn't want to waste #water, right?  😉

@poemblaze @IIChronDCCXIV @08ChristMyLord But where did they get the idea that in the case of a nuclear attack, you have to remain at a 6 ft distance, except for others in your household?  What if family members of the same household are exposed to radiation?

Is FEMA getting their talking points from @CDCgov or @NIH?
@IIChronDCCXIV @RobinEnochs Maybe a M17 protective mask may work in a hot zone. How many civilians have these? Much less extra filters. MOPP suits? Decon? Your best bet is distance.

@IIChronDCCXIV @08ChristMyLord This might possibly be saying if you have been exposed to fallout, you should stay six feet away from others and wear a mask in order to prevent radiation from you affecting others.
